steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"aht7m","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e2s6u","text":" ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":1},{"style":"align-left","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"24dgr","text":" ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":1},{"style":"align-left","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5g9vf","text":"Thaw an aliquot of Poly-L-Ornithine solution at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"8833410222CF499FABAB1450798D9D22","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Poly-L- Ornithine","rrid":"","sku":"A-004-C","url":"http://","vendor":{"id":17,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"http://sigmaaldrich.com","name":"Merck MilliporeSigma (Sigma-Aldrich)"}}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"Stock concentration","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"50","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"Working concentration","scientificNotation":false,"unit":205}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"59ogm","text":"use a 5mL pipette to Triturate cells only 1 or 2 times before seeding.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e7p2u","text":"Discard the supernatant and resuspend in 1mL LUHMES growth media ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7637f","text":"Transfer cells to 15mL tube and centrifuge for 5 minutes at 1200 RPM","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5rk1h","text":"Neutralize trypsin with 6mL of pre-warmed DMEM/F12","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"31emg","text":"Add 4mL of the pre-warmed .025% Trypsin/EDTA and place in the incubator for 3 minutes.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":86,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"359ud","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"625mn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"BDAE7B0E61DA4CEDB768ADFBBFD6425F","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Trypsin/edta Solution (TE)","rrid":"","sku":"R001100","url":"http://","vendor":{"id":9,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.lifetechnologies.com","name":"Thermo Scientific"}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e0ke5","text":"Remove media and rinse with DPBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

not vortex or shake vigorously to resuspend the fibronectin. This will cause the fibronectin to “crash” out of solution, which is irreversible","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b4fas","text":"Change (pre-warmed) media every 1-2 days","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2l2hu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3i7tr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"am9pq","text":"LUHMES are sensitive to changes in the media pH and oxidative stress. Always use fresh DMEM/F12 because the HEPES buffer in DMEM is subject to photooxidation upon exposure to light and produces hydrogen peroxide.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d7j4o","text":"Dilute the Fibronectin in sterile Hank’s Balanced Salt Solution (HBSS). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"85lvq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"10b4j","text":"Add   to   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5rnf0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"Fibronectin","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"998","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"HBSS","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"37rl5","text":"Rinse 3 times with HBSS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"945jq","text":"Air dry for 15 minutes and add LUHMES growth media. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6pbd0","text":"Dilute Poly-L-Ornithine solution to 50ug/mL in Nuclease-free water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3i47c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2vgll","text":"Add   of PLO for every   Nuclease-free water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"av67l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b63d6","text":"Add 7mL of the 50ug/mL PLO to a T-75 overnight at RT.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cmba8","text":"Rinse flask 3 times with bio-grade water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fr498","text":"Allow the flask to air dry for 15 minutes uncapped and standing upright in the hood. (turn on UV)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a4jfa","text":"Label 2mL cryovials with the date, name, FIV#, Qbench number, passage number and cell type.     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"abutj","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"arq5i","text":"Add about 1.5 million cells per vial with 1mL freezing media. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"48pes","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"angbc","text":"Freezing Media: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"61jae","text":" 7mL LUHMES Media","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"49s52","text":" 4uL B-fgf (40ng)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9c919","text":" 2mL FBS (20%)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8vnl8","text":"1mL DMSO (1%)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"65q37","text":"Add fresh culture media to flask for at least 15 minutes before seeding cells to\nallow media to reach normal pH","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"avou2","text":"Place fibronectin coated flask in incubator for 3 hours","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"618es","text":"Day 0, when the LUHMES are 80% confluent, add differentiation media and incubate overnight.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8gup3","text":"Day 1, replate cells onto a new poly-l-ornithine and fibronectin-coated plate. Replate cells at a density of 1 million cells per T-75 flask or ~ 400,000 per well of a 6-well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3nosn","text":"Replace LUHMES differentiation media every day while differentiation (neurons become mature in    7-days)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"jp3r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eqaof","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"735n0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b9ub2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":207.74545454545452,"id":444601,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"ft2h2\",\"text\":\"LUHMES Differentiation Timeline\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/jpeg","originalFile":{},"original_name":"LUHMES timeline.jpg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/puf5b6697.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/puf3b6697.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/puf4b6697.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/puf2b6697.webp","width":580}}}}
